document_name_accent: viem duong tiet nieu sau sinh.json
document_title: Postpartum urinary tract infection: Causes and effective treatments
subsection_name: viem-duong-tiet-nieu-sau-sinh.json_4_Can I take medicine while breastfeeding?
subsection_content:
According to Urology experts, Tam Anh General Hospital System, there are currently many types of antibiotics to treat urinary tract infections that are quite safe and cause few side effects, so they can still be prescribed to pregnant women with the disease. and are breastfeeding.
However, not all urinary tract infections require treatment with medication. Instead, there are some effective tips for treating postpartum urinary tract infections shared below.
